mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_ratechangelog (rateconfigid, beforerate, afterrate, modifytime, modifier) values (#{rateconfigid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beforerate}, #{afterrate}, #{modifytime}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update t_tfs_ratechangelog
cashieritemid = #{cashieritemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bustype = #{bustype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ratetype = #{ratetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rsrate = #{rsrate},
standrate = #{standrate},
executionrate = #{executionrate},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime},
where rateconfigid = #{rateconfigid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
